start: ^Legionnaire! I see you're done with Movement Training!
^Every Legionnaire must know how to fight! so are you ready Legionnaire?
^Excellent! That's what I like to hear! more soldiers like you we would everything that oppose us.
^Proceeding to Training! First I'll teach you basic combat how to use your gladius, scutum, and pilum.
^Think of this weapon as your woman, you must fight for it no matter what happens you must not lose it in the midst of a battle!
^The most effective way of using this is by stabbing it at your enemy!
^Now show me what you can do stab those training dummies 10 times!
goal_0: ^Great! now you can protect yourself against any enemy!
goal_1: ^Now that's done, walk to the left!
goal_2: ^You are almost done with this small exercise, now show me if you can run! Run to the right!
goal_3: ^Impressive Legionnaire! before we end the training run to the left DAMN IT!
goal_4: ^Excellent Legionnaire! You have finished your movement training now move to the Legate for combat training.
exhaust: ^What do you want? I gave you a task! DO IT!
scold: ^Pft- You better be ready next time!
